评论详情: Great shirt, true to size. Soft and comfortable.
Very soft, good quality. Looks just like the picture. I got an xl for oversized look.  I'm usually picky with fabric and I was very pleased with the material of the shirt.

评论概述: Designs on shirt are not applied well
评论详情: First, I have never read these books BUT my girlfriend absolutely loves this series so I tracked down some ACOTAR merchandise and this shirt made the list. The shirt arrived and I gave it to her straight out of the box cause I love to spoil her and we both immediately noticed that the designs on the shirt were already peeling off, if not totally peeled off. I plan to return the shirt ASAP and order another one to see if it's just a bad apple in the bunch. Check the shirt before you give it as a gift. Was super embarrassing.

Absolutely love this shirt! If you've read the ACOTAR series, then of course you are also obsessed with it! so you need this shirt too. The fit is good and so far it hasn't shrunk, faded or cracked the vinyl after washing. I'm sure this will be the first of many to come for my book obsessed collection of Valraris clothing.
I LOVE this shirt! The quality is great and sizing is spot on. I would buy it again and 100% recommend.
Fits well. The material is thick and of food quality. Design seems to be holding well, but I have only washed it twice so far.
The fit is tts and the quality is great! I love it and have even received compliments while wearing it.
Love the Bat Boys! This shirt is awesome!
